content: from * to end 2 5 /4 5 5 6 cm from underarm ending after working 2 rnds with cc buttonhole placement using removable stitch markers place a marker 7 sts in from the bottom for long-sleeves until meas approx 5 5 5 6 and 7 sts in from the top place remaining markers 6 5 /13 14 15 17 cm from underarm ending approx 8 or 12 sts apart from each other making after working 2 rnds with cc sure to place marker in-between 2 purl sts when last round broken out by size below looking at it from the rs 3 month & 12 month sizes only with mc k1 row 4 buttonhole row rs k2 p2 k2 p1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 - 2 sts decrease d remove marker yo k2tog k1 p2 k2 to 1 st before next marker p1 remove marker yo k2tog 6 month size only with mc k to last 3 sts k1 repeat from * through last marker p2 k2 k2tog k1 - 1 st decrease d row 5 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end 18 month size only with mc k to end row 6 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end wrist ribbing row 7 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end switch to us 7/4 5 mm dpns and continue with mc you can cut cc yarn bobble in pattern round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 until meas approx 1/2 3/4 3/4 3/4 /1 5 2 2 2 cm bobble in pattern www elizabethsmithknits com 3 right band with us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ join mc at bottom right front edge of garment pick up and k 3 sts for every 4 row along garment edge making sure to pick up the same number of sts as you did for the left side row 1 ws p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end row 2 rs k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end repeat row 1-2 2 more times then repeat row 1 1 more time bobble in pattern finishing weave in all ends block to schematic measurements attach buttons tutorial available on tips page - see link on page 5 schematic chest circumference a 19 5 21 5 22 25 23 /49 5 54 5 56 5 58 cm body width b 9 75 10 75 11 11 5 /25 27 28 29 cm armhole depth c 4 4 5 4 5 4 75 /10 11 11 12 cm underarm to hem length d 5 6 7 7 5 /13 15 18 19 cm sleeve length d short-sleeves 2 2 75 2 75 3 25 /5 7 7 8 cm long-sleeves 5 75 6 25 6 75 7 25 /14 5 16 17 18 cm www elizabethsmithknits com 4 pattern techniques & tips techniques visit elizabethsmithknits com/coffeebeantips for knitted-on cast-on insert rn into stitch on ln
